p: Many studies revealed that various bacteriostatic or bactericidal antibiotics can assist wound closing, still their positive influence on wound healing is regularly unnoticed. Even if countless antibiotics are known to be effective against infection-producing microorganisms, merely quinolones, tetracyclines, aminoglycosides and cephalosporins have been applied to produce antimicrobial wound dressings. Table 3 summarizes the antibiotics-containing wound dressings and their spectrum of action.
